ValidationRule.description: When a CRM moves the Stage of an Opportunity to Approved, Has Consultant can not be = to "Research Required". - Added during Consultant Project by Cloud Theory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Has_Consultant__c ,"Research Required"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,"7: Approved"), RecordType.DeveloperName ="PFG")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must set the Has Consultant? field to either "Yes" or "No" to save the record.
